alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 11:16AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, Bay, western Calhoun and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through NOON EDT/1100 AM CDT/... At 1116 AM EDT/1016 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles southeast of Chipley to near Springfield to 12 miles south of Panama City Beach. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Bradford, Parker, Wausau, Moose Pond, Dirego Park, College Station, West Panama City, Camps Head, Bahama Beach, Bennett, Porter Lake, Brannonville and Millville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington
